Class DefaultAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals.AbstractDefaultAnimation
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals.DefaultAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultAnimation, IsDefaultBaseAnimation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultTransitions.ActiveDefaultAnimationTransition.ActiveDefaultAnimation, DefaultTransitions.ResizeDefaultAnimationTransition.ResizeDefaultAnimation

    public class DefaultAnimation
extends AbstractDefaultAnimation
implements IsDefaultAnimation
    CHART.JS default values for ANIMATION element.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isAnimateRotate()
      If true, the chart will animate in with a rotation animation.
      boolean isAnimateScale()
      If true, will animate scaling the chart from the center outwards.
